exercise-tasks.description: List all countries with their cities using a LEFT JOIN
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Countries.Name AS CountryName,
  Cities.Name AS CityName
FROM Countries
LEFT JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Countries.Name AS CountryName, Cities.Name AS CityName FROM Countries LEFT JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID

exercise-tasks.description: Show countries and cities, including countries with no cities
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Countries.Name AS CountryName,
  Cities.Name AS CityName
FROM Countries
LEFT JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Countries.Name AS CountryName, Cities.Name AS CityName FROM Countries LEFT JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID

exercise-tasks.description: Find countries that do not have any cities
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Countries.Name AS CountryName
FROM Countries
LEFT JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID
WHERE Cities.Name IS NULL
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Countries.Name AS CountryName FROM Countries LEFT JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID WHERE Cities.Name IS NULL

exercise-tasks.description: Count the number of cities per country, including countries with zero cities
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  Countries.Name AS CountryName,
  COUNT(Cities.CityID) AS NumCities
FROM Countries
LEFT JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID
GROUP BY Countries.Name
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT Countries.Name AS CountryName, COUNT(Cities.CityID) AS NumCities FROM Countries LEFT JOIN Cities ON Countries.CountryID = Cities.CountryID GROUP BY Countries.Name

exercise-tasks.description: List all countries and cities using table aliases, showing NULL for missing cities
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT
  co.Name AS CountryName,
  c.Name AS CityName
FROM Countries co
LEFT JOIN Cities c ON co.CountryID = c.CountryID
exercise-tasks.verify-query: SELECT co.Name AS CountryName, c.Name AS CityName FROM Countries co LEFT JOIN Cities c ON co.CountryID = c.CountryID
